original_text: Do not speak strongly to an older man and tell him what he must do. Instead, ask him in a kind way, as you would speak to your father. Speak to younger men as you would speak to your brothers. Timothy 4 Timothy 6
korean_text: 늙은이를 꾸짖지 말고 권하되 아버지에게 하듯 하며 젊은이에게는 형제에게 하듯 하고

sentences.original_text: Do not speak strongly to an older man
and tell him what he must do
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 무엇을 해야 하는지 말하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Instead, ask him in a kind way
as you would speak to your father
as you would speak to your brothers
